title: One hundred and one dalmatians = 101 dalmations
creator_credit: Clyde Geronimi, Hamilton Luske, Wolfgang Reitherman, Walt Disney and Walt Disney Pictures
brief_description: Pongo and Perdita settle into their owner’s home and become the proud parents of fifteen beautiful dalmation puppies. Cruella De Vil thinks that the litter would make a perfect dogskin coat and with the help of her henchmen, steals the puppies. Pongo and Perdita and their canine friends, embark on a dangerous rescue mission, and at last are reunited with their children and more dalmations! Based on the novel by Dodie Smith. Features the voices of Rod Taylor, Betty Lou Gerson, Cate Bauer, Lisa Daniels, Ben Wright and others.
